attributes.title: no thanks🧚🏼💅🏼🤩
attributes.review:
why does he even have this app? he promised us so much stuff and is just going to take it away. gen-z is now going to war. you ban our pride we take away yours🥰.  just tell them to stop spying instead of taking away something the gen-z loves. 

sincerely, the simpsons 🤪

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!! NEVER AGAIN.

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app to support my cheeto president, only to open the app to see hundreds of nude photos of him! 😖

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Makes my phone heat up and crash

attributes.title: Pointless app
attributes.review: The app should get deleted it literally has no reason to be in the app store

attributes.title: i am not happy
attributes.review: i downloaded this app so i can get updates about trump for the 2020 election but this app is so hard to use. it is disgusting and trash. all it does is spam my phone and i dislike using it. the photos used for trump are also disgusting and make my eyes hurt.

attributes.title: Lowkey not cool
attributes.review: This dude is like completely awful and he doesn’t even know how to run a country like fr. I’m glad I can vote this Cheeto out of office 🧚🏼‍♀️✨💕

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: I was SO VERY excited to support the caterpillar headed Cheeto currently sitting in office but was very disappointed to realize that he is a racist, homophobic, sexist piece of doo doo trash as well as this propaganda filled app.

attributes.title: Cmon trump
attributes.review: Having a president use an app to just try and promote his own stuff and mainly to slander another president doesn’t work.
